metadata.title: RA Family: Transmission of Zero Packet Length on USB

sections.content: The end of USB data transfer is determined by one of the following conditions.

Now considering the case where the data length to be transferred is not pre-defined between the USB host and the USB device and the length is a multiple of wMaxPacketSize, the condition (b) above is not to be satisfied. In this case, a zero-length packet is appended to satisfy the condition (c).
Note: The maximum length of a USB packet to or from a USB endpoint is limited to the value of the wMaxPacketSize field of the endpoint's descriptor.
